attributes.action: encourage the Speaker of the House of Commons to resign
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A majority of the British public and most Members of Parliament, regardless of political party, believe the way in which MPs expenses are handled,needs to be urgently reformed. This can only happen under the guidance of a new Speaker.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
